pr_title: Update NPM packages with S1 vulnerabilities

timeline.message: Update NPM packages with S1 vulnerabilities
Update NPM packages with S1 vulnerabilities
Update NPM packages with S1 vulnerabilities

timeline.bodyText:
Ran security check to check for S1 vulnerabilities and fixed them.
Wen't over the release notes of each package and verified the breaking changes didn't affect us.
Ran a local version of the UI and did a short sanity test (created a role, added members, viewed history). Everything seems in order
Locked flatpicker on version 4.6.3. It got upgraded to 4.6.6 without it and it apparently changes the name of some CSS classes (remove the fp- at the start of it) which caused snapshot tests to fail (although visually I didn't notice any difference).
timeline.author: OferLevi85
